name: Minimalistica
description:
Minimalistica is a short "horror" game. If I can call it Horror tbh

It was made in roughly 2 weeks for the Newbie Jam with the Main  Theme being Minimalistic.

This was the best Idea I could think of, so I went with it!

It is also my first project I ever really finished + uploaded.

It was fun making it, if you have feedback or found any bugs I'll be glad to hear it in the comments!

(i know the music is loud and kinda awful btw)
